q1: What are the chances that Uruguay will advance to the semi-finals this season?
a1: That seems unlikely but stranger things have happened.
q2: They haven’t in a long time and Suarez and Cavani are getting pretty old.
a2: That's true, but they should have one more shot in 2022.
q3: Hopefully they're win before they retire.
q4: Uruguay needs to replace some of their players with younger and more talented players.
a4: If they want to enter into semi finals their players should more talented.
q5: Young players can have higher performance
